feed.title: Maker Management Platform Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Maker Management Platform: v1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Implement discovery endpoints #84 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/89
  • 62 implement settings endpoint by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/91
  • Fix missing tem path on first boot by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/92
  • Single sse endpoint by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/93
  • Arm troubleshoot by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/96
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/94
  • Bump github.com/valyala/fasthttp from 1.22.0 to 1.34.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/95
  • BUG: duplicated temp file on second upload #90 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/97
  • Issue: Importing "things" with same name #83 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/98
  • v1.1.0 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/101

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/94

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/compare/v1.0.5...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Maker Management Platform: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature asset types endpoint #106 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/109
  • Allow update on discovery #108 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/111
  • Asset type order for the UI #110 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/113
  • 114 discoveryprocessing status broadcast by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/116
  • Fix system paths endpoint to prevent nested projects without .projectâ€¦ by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/117

  • 118 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/119

  • 120 by @EduardoOliveira in https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/pull/121

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Maker-Management-Platform/agent/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0
